p:
Antimicrobial activities of Salvia mirzayanii essential oil were strong against vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus faecium as well as both vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus faecalis and vancomycin-sensitive Enterococcus faecalis. Earlier finding showed MIC for Salvia mirzayanii essential oil to inhibit the growth of Enterococcus faecalis was 10 μL/mL. (This was collected from Darab, Fars, rich in α-terpinenyl acetate and 1,8-cineol.) This value (MIC) was ≥15 μL/mL in other Salvia species.
9 These evidences suggest that Salvia mirzayanii essential oils are more powerful against these bacteria in comparison to other reported species.
